title: Xiaomi Mijia Smart Audio Glasses and Redmi Buds 8 Lite debut
description: Xiaomi held a European launch event for the Redmi Note 15 series today, and it also expanded its smart wearables with the Redmi Buds 8 Lite wireless earbuds and Mijia Smart Audio Glasses. Mijia Smart Audio Glasses look like regular glasses but incorporate dual speakers and quad microphones. This means they can be used like a pair of wireless earbuds with some additional smart features. They feature touch-sensitive areas on the temples, which allow you to adjust playback, volume, access your device‚Äôs voice assistant or manage calls. Xiaomi also added real-time recording for calls...

title: Spotify gains a new UI for Android tablets
description: Spotify has quietly revamped its UI for Android tablets recently. There's a media player on the right, which you can change the dimensions of just like you can in Spotify's desktop app. There's also a new bar at the bottom with icons for Home, Search, Library, and Create. This new UI seems to be rolling out already and it's not a beta build - you will get it if you have an Android tablet. It's a nice quality of life improvement that makes the playback control experience more flexible. Via (in Dutch)

title: The global rollout of the Redmi Note 15 begins in earnest, here are the prices
description: They took their sweet, sweet time, but the Redmi Note 15 series phones have finally arrived in Europe. The series made its debut in China with slightly different specs, then launched in India. The global launch originally happened in mid-December, so we‚Äôve been waiting for a while. The five new models are finally available. And yes, it‚Äôs five models as Xiaomi continues building 4G versions for the Pro and vanilla members (the Pro+ is 5G only). This generation is defined by ‚ÄúRedmi Titan Durability‚Äù. This includes the first SiC batteries in the Redmi Note family ‚Äì the Redmi Note 15 Pro+...

title: HMD teases new DUB series TWS earphones
description: HMD unveiled half a dozen DUB series TWS earphones last month, and now it's set to launch another pair. HMD hasn't revealed the name or the launch date of this upcoming DUB series TWS earphones, but it posted an image on X that hints at a design similar to the DUB X50 Pro unveiled last month. ü§´ pic.twitter.com/OvWN7NEL6s‚Äî HMD (@HMDdevices) January 14, 2026 The HMD DUB X50 Pro have an in-ear design with an IPX4 rating. They also support active noise cancellation (ANC) and feature Hi-fi DSP. HMD DUB X50 Pro Each earbud comes with a 70 mAh battery, while the charging case...

title: Apple is working on encryption support for RCS messages
description: It was nearly a year ago that the GSM Association published the RCS Universal Profile 3.0, which, among other things, includes an end-to-end encryption (E2EE) standard for messages. The previous E2EE implementation was a Google-specific thing, which is why Apple didn‚Äôt support it when it adopted RCS with iOS 18. Now that there is an industry standard, Apple is working to implement it ‚Äì this will finally enable encrypted messaging between Android and Apple devices. Well, Apple is not pushing itself too hard ‚Äì again, it‚Äôs been almost a year ‚Äì but signs of support have been discovered in iOS...

title: Oppo A6c debuts as rebadged A6x 4G
description: Oppo has been on a barrage of A6 series announcements lately and the latest one is the Oppo A6c. It‚Äôs not exactly new as the device shares its key specs with the recently announced Oppo A6x 4G but the A6c is only available in a single 6GB RAM and 128GB storage trim. It also comes with a slightly different back design and two color options - Orchid Purple and Olive Green. The A6c is built around a 6.75-inch IPS LCD (HD+ 120Hz) with 1,125 nits peak brightness. It features a Snapdragon 685 chipset at the helm and a 6,500 mAh battery. There‚Äôs a single 13MP rear camera around the back,...

title: Motorola Signature's India launch date confirmed, pricing leaks
description: Motorola introduced its new premium Signature lineup at CES 2026 earlier this month. The first device in the series is simply called the Motorola Signature. After making its debut in the UK and EU, the company has now announced its India launch date. The Motorola Signature will be unveiled in India on January 23 and will be sold via Flipkart and Motorola‚Äôs online store in India. Although Motorola did not reveal the Indian pricing for the Signature, a tipster has shared the details. According to the leak, the 16GB/1TB variant is expected to carry a box price of INR 84,999 ($940),...

title: Realme P4 Power's key features revealed ahead of launch, will pack a 10k mAh battery
description: Indian online retailer Flipkart teased a new Realme P-Series smartphone yesterday, which was believed to be the P4 Power with a 10,001 mAh battery. Today, Realme confirmed that this upcoming P-Series smartphone is the P4 Power without revealing its launch date. While Realme hasn't detailed the P4 Power's specs sheet, it has revealed a few features of the smartphone. For starters, the Realme P4 Power will pack a big battery. How big? Well, Realme hasn't provided a number but said the battery capacity will be in the 5-digit range, meaning we are looking at a 10k mAh battery. A...

title: iPhone Fold may use a liquid metal hinge, new leak suggests
description: The first foldable from Apple, tentatively called the iPhone Fold, is rumored to launch later this year alongside the iPhone 18 Pro series. A new leak now sheds light on its construction and the materials Apple may be using. According to the leak, Apple‚Äôs foldable iPhone will use a hinge crafted from a material known as liquid metal. The rumor also suggests Apple has been experimenting with this material for more than 15 years. The use of liquid metal is expected to improve hinge durability and minimize stress at the folding point. Meanwhile, the iPhone Fold‚Äôs main body will...

title: Realme Neo8 showcased in all three colorways
description: Realme is unveiling the Neo8 on January 22, and ahead of that, the company is showing it in all three colorways in which it will be sold. These roughly translate from Chinese as Cyber Purple, Mecha Grey, and Origin White. Realme Neo8 official images Realme has already confirmed that the Neo8 will be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC, and will have a Samsung-made AMOLED screen with a 165 Hz refresh rate and 6,500-nit peak brightness, a 16MP selfie camera, and an in-display ultrasonic fingerprint sensor. More Realme Neo8 official images According to rumors,...

title: Google Pixel 10a price leaks along with its release date
description: There's been a lot of news about the Google Pixel 10a in the past couple of days or so. First, its colorways leaked along with a rough release timeframe, then a purported official image leaked. Now a new rumor from a tipster on X claims to have pricing information and an exact release date: February 17. The 128GB model will allegedly cost ‚Ç¨500, while the 256GB version will go for ‚Ç¨600. Official color-matching cases will go for ‚Ç¨20 each. Google Pixel 9a Of course this pricing, if accurate, applies to the Eurozone. What's notable here is that the starting price is ‚Ç¨50 lower than the...

title: Google launches Personal Intelligence for Gemini
description: Google today introduced Personal Intelligence for Gemini. This is an opt-in feature. If you turn it on, it securely connects information from apps like Gmail, YouTube, Google Search, and Google Photos, which Gemini can then use in its conversations with you. This is rolling out over the next week to eligible Google AI Pro and AI Ultra subscribers in the US. It works across the web, Android, and iOS. If you are in the US you can see if you've got it by going to the Gemini app or website, then to Settings > Personal Intelligence. That's where you can select which apps you want connected...

title: Samsung Internet for Windows is now widely available, no more restrictions
description: Back in October, Samsung launched its web browser called Internet on Windows. This was a pretty important development, as Samsung Internet had before that point been relegated to Android devices. Samsung Internet for Windows was a beta release and only available in Korea and the US. That changes today. Samsung Internet for Windows is now available to everyone regardless of locale (even though the official website may still claim it's only available in Korea and the US, the Download button works everywhere). It is still a beta release, that hasn't changed. The wider availability does hint...

title: Motorola Moto G (2026) in for review
description: This is the Moto G (2026) and came out in early November, and has been on sale since last month. It's very similar to its predecessor, with only slight changes to the specs sheet. We'll call them quality of life type upgrades - you get twice the base storage at 128GB and a slightly bigger 5,200mAh battery. Oh, and the selfie camera has doubled from a 16MP unit to a 32MP one with a brighter f/2.2 lens. The rest of the specs are nearly identical - a 6.7-inch IPS LCD with 1,000 nits of brightness, and a 120Hz refresh rate. Even the chipset is the same 6nm Dimensity 6300 with 4GB of...

title: Nothing Phone (4a) series to have improved storage, possibly higher prices
description: Nothing CEO Carl Pei today confirmed that "some products", launching before the end of March, will have UFS 3.1 storage. This quite obviously refers to the Phone (4a) series, though which exact device(s) will be blessed with UFS 3.1 storage and which will miss out remains to be seen. Last year, the Nothing Phone (3a) and Nothing Phone (3a) Pro launched in early March, which is why we assume that their successors are what Pei is talking about. Those devices use UFS 2.2 storage, a decision which Nothing explained at the time as not being "about cutting costs, but about putting resources...

title: Samsung Galaxy S26's charging speed may surprise you
description: The Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra has long been rumored to up its wired charging capacity to 60W. The S26+ was supposedly staying at 45W just like the S25+, and the S26 at 25W like the S25. But today a new rumor claims the vanilla Galaxy S26 will actually go up to 45W, matching the Plus model. Of course it remains to be seen what this means in practice in terms of an actual improvement in charging time, but it's a good move nonetheless. The Galaxy S26 and S26+ are both said to be using the Exynos 2600 chipset, though it's not mentioned whether it will make an appearance in some markets only....

title: Taiwan issues arrest warrant for OnePlus CEO
description: Liu Zuohu, also known as Pete Lau, is the co-founder and CEO of OnePlus, and he has led the brand since its inception in 2013. While we haven‚Äôt heard much from the exec in the last few months, he is now facing arrest charges by Taiwanese prosecutors. The reason? Illegal hiring practices in Taiwan. Taiwan‚Äôs Shilin District Prosecutors' Office issued an official document on Tuesday indicting two Taiwanese citizens for aiding in the recruiting practices of the OnePlus CEO. According to prosecutors, OnePlus, with Lau at the helm, hired over 70 engineers based in Taiwan to work on...

title: RedMagic 11 Air design, color options, and display specs revealed
description: The RedMagic 11 Air is set to debut in China on January 20. Ahead of the launch, nubia has begun confirming key specifications and has also showcased the phone‚Äôs full design along with its color options. nubia‚Äôs upcoming slim yet powerful RedMagic 11 Air will feature a 6.85-inch AMOLED display with 1.5K resolution and a 144Hz refresh rate. It will also offer a 95.1% screen-to-body ratio, an under-display selfie camera, 2,592Hz PWM dimming, and 1.25mm thin bezels. The handset features a curved rear transparent panel with an RGB logo and a triple camera setup. The phone will be...

title: Huawei Pura 90 Ultra camera module design and specs leaked
description: The Huawei Pura 90 Ultra is expected to launch in the coming months as the successor to the Pura 80 Ultra. Although Huawei hasn‚Äôt confirmed details about the Pura 90 lineup, a new leak reveals the Ultra variant‚Äôs camera specifications and rear design. According to a tipster on Weibo, the Pura 90 Ultra may feature a redesigned rear camera module. The triangular deco is expected to remain, but it will reportedly sit within a horizontal camera bar as seen in a leaked sketch. Meanwhile, the tipster has also shared key camera details. The handset is expected to feature a 50MP 1-inch...

title: Google Meet‚Äôs conference room detection is now available on Android and iOS
description: Back in August, Google introduced a smart feature that recognizes when you are in a conference room with other people and automatically launches companion mode to join Meet calls. It was exclusive to desktops/laptops until now, as Google has announced its availability for Android and iOS devices. The feature will follow a gradual rollout schedule over the next two weeks. Automatic room check-in for Google Meet on Android The feature simplifies the process of joining group meetings by using your device‚Äôs microphone to pick up ultrasonic signals within the room and automatically...
